name: Solitaire 2G Double
description:
This is a solitaire game that uses two decks of cards.

This is a little different from the classic solitaire, no need to rack your brain, enjoy it and you're going to love it.

- 4 leaderboards for world ranking
- Unlimited undo and hints
- Auto complete
- Statistics
- Ranking for Winning Streak
- Add 30+ patterns for poker backside
- Add 2 patterns for poker face
